Excellent negotiator

quotes: Gives them space to develop, lets us have the stage
Good at spotting and evaluating talent

Tone setter, keeping the group cohesive and united

People Development & Collaborative Leade.name: Will Langenstein

Good at coaching others

quotes: Not sure he is mentoring anymore but he has the skill
